answers.answer: I wouldn't worry it was just 2 minutes so it might be pretty accurate... he probably didn't like it
Agreed that he probably didnt like it. The took my blood 5 minutes early (they switched nurses and didnt want to go over the time) and I passed with 45 points under what it needed to be.

question: I threw up the last two minutes of my hour wait, they still took my blood but does that put me at higher risk out gestational diabetes or did my baby just not like the drink?? I didn't throw up with my son and was negative for GD.
title: Throwing up during glucose test?
